verses.roman:
bhakta-gaṇa paḍe āsi' prabhura caraṇe
uṭhāñā prabhu sabāre kailā āliṅgane

synonyms: bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees; paḍe—fell; āsi'-coming; prabhura caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; uṭhāñā—getting them up; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabāre—all of them; kailā āliṅgane—embraced.
translation: All the devotees immediately fell at the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, and the Lord lifted and embraced every one of them.
